landing.heroSub: Your agents are ready. Your data isn't. Folio connects to your existing tools, maps what's there, and builds a verified knowledge base any AI agent can navigate.
landing.problemTitle: AI is only as good as the data behind it.
landing.problemP1: Most companies have years of knowledge locked in scattered tools, legacy systems, and undocumented processes. Without structure, even the best models can't deliver.
landing.problemP2: Folio builds the foundation ‚Äî so your agents actually understand your business.
landing.fiveSteps: Five steps to a navigable company.
landing.step01Text: Link your existing tools in minutes. Google Drive, Gmail, Pennylane, OneDrive, Outlook. Nothing moves. Nothing breaks.
landing.step02Text: AI agents map everything that's there. Volume, structure, relationships, inconsistencies, gaps. For the first time, you see your company's knowledge as a whole.
landing.step03Text: The agent organizes everything into a hierarchical knowledge base with context at every level ‚Äî READMEs, cross-references, domain clusters. Not a search index. A navigable map.
landing.step04Text: The agent surfaces what it can't resolve alone. You answer a few precise questions. The knowledge base becomes verified, paradox-free, and complete.
landing.step05Text: Any AI agent can now navigate your company with precision. Build email agents, compliance agents, client communication agents ‚Äî all drawing from the same verified source.
landing.verifyQuestion: 340 entries are labeled "Ref". Is this an invoice reference, client code, or internal ID?
landing.flat1: Dumps data into a vector store
landing.folio2: Agent reads READMEs, drills to exact location
landing.dataMoatP1: When Folio's agents figure out how to handle a new data format, resolve a recurring ambiguity, or connect a new source ‚Äî that knowledge enters a shared guide library available to every future deployment.
landing.dataMoatP2: Every cabinet onboarded makes the next one faster. Every edge case solved becomes a pattern.
landing.whoTitle: Built for businesses AI was supposed to help first.
landing.whoP1: Traditional businesses ‚Äî accounting firms, law practices, consulting agencies ‚Äî have the most to gain from AI and the least-ready data to support it.
landing.whoP2: We started with French accounting firms. 19,000 cabinets. 3 million SME clients. Complex regulation, fragmented tools, and an industry that knows AI is coming.
landing.whoExpertiseP: Mountains of client documents. Regulatory complexity. Excel everywhere.
landing.whoCabinetP: Case files across decades. Contracts referencing contracts. Nothing linked.
landing.whoConseilP: Client data scattered across projects. No institutional memory.
landing.visionP1: Companies with structured, verified, navigable knowledge will deploy AI agents in days.
landing.visionP2: Companies without it will spend months just getting their data ready.
landing.visionP3: Folio is the layer that closes that gap.
landing.visionTagline: Not a chatbot. Not a search tool. The knowledge infrastructure for the agentic enterprise.
landing.earlyAccessNote: Free pilot for accounting, legal, and consulting firms. Set up in under a day.
landing.earlyAccessPrivacy: Your data never leaves your environment.
landing.earlyAccessDoneP: We'll reach out within 24 hours to schedule your demo.

dashboard.subtitle: Manage your company data connections
dashboard.noClientsP: Create your first client to start making their data AI-ready.

client.welcomeP: Connect Google Workspace data sources to begin making this client's data AI-ready. Click a button below to authenticate via OAuth, then start the exploration.
client.noDataSources: No data sources yet. Add one to get started.
client.waitingQuestionnaire: Waiting for the agent to generate a verification questionnaire...
client.allAnsweredP: The knowledge base is ready for deployment.
client.selectNode: Select a node from the tree to view knowledge entries.

metrics.readyToExploreP: Add data sources and start an exploration to see metrics here.
